titles.title: Student Loan Repayment Extension Act
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to extend and make uniform the repayment plans available under the various Federal student loan programs.

bill.summary: 9/3/1997--Introduced. Student Loan Repayment Extension Act - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to extend and make uniform the terms of repayment plans available under the various Federal student loan programs (insured, guaranteed, consolidation, and direct loan programs).
